item.title: New details of shooting ambush that killed two officers revealed as police search homes in hunt for Dezi Freem
item.description: <p>It comes as it emerged Dezi Freeman allegedly tried to kill a fourth officer, only for luck to intervene.</p>

item.title: Adelaide teacher pleads guilty to snatching dog from owner's backyard
item.description: <p>A teacher from Adelaide&#x27;s eastern suburbs has pleaded guilty to snatching a dog from his loving family&#x27;s backyard.</p>

item.title: 'I would not accept that': RBA boss says rate cuts didn't cause housing crisis in tense Senate hearing
item.description: <p>RBA Governor Michele Bullock has hit back at suggestions from the Greens that the central bank is responsible for Australia&#x27;s skyrocketing house prices in a tense parliamentary hearing.</p>

item.title: Person found dead after fatal townhouse fire in Sydney's north west
item.description: <p>Firefighters arrived at the Eastwood home shortly after receiving reports of a fire and found a body inside the home.</p>

item.title: Quest to find source of persistent humming noise in Sydney's west one step closer
item.description: <p>The EPA is now making two sites to increase noise monitoring for at least two more weeks.</p>

item.title: Boy, 15, fatally hit by truck while walking to school in central Victoria
item.description: <p>A 15-year-old boy has been struck and killed by a truck while walking to school in Victoria this morning.</p>

item.title: Man charged with murder after brawl turns deadly in Queensland
item.description: <p>Police say a violent brawl turned deadly after a 40-year-old Pialba man was allegedly beaten with a bat or metal pole at a Hervey Bay home.</p>

item.title: Melbourne mum found lying lifeless in the hallway by her son after he came home from work
item.description: <p>Her son made the shocking discovery after returning from work, finding her lying lifeless in the hallway with fatal injuries.</p>

item.title: María Corina Machado awarded Nobel Peace Prize, White House criticises committee for overlooking Trump
item.description: <p>Award given to &quot;brave and committed champion of peace ... who keeps flame of democracy burning&quot;.</p>

item.title: Synergy under fire after admitting to taking $40 million from customers
item.description: <p>The state-owned utility is blaming a &quot;system failure&quot; for the error as they work to pay back hundreds of thousands of people.</p>

item.title: Putin praises Trump's peace efforts even after failing to win the Nobel prize
item.description: <p>Russian President Vladimir Putin praised US President Donald Trump&#x27;s peace efforts, despite not winning the Nobel prize.</p>

item.title: Thousands of Palestinians return to what remains of their homes as Gaza ceasefire takes effect
item.description: <p>Tens of thousands of people who had gathered in Wadi Gaza in central Gaza in the morning started walking north after the military&#x27;s announcement a noon local time (8pm AEDT).</p>

item.title: Melania Trump says some children caught in Ukraine war returned to families after talks with Putin
item.description: <p>US first lady Melania Trump said she had secured an open line of communication with Russian President Vladimir Putin about repatriating Ukrainian children caught up in the war with Russia.</p>

item.title: Today in History - October 11: Gust of wind blows baseball player's plane into apartment building
item.description: <p>A top baseball player was killed when a powerful gust of wind blew his light plane into a New York apartment building on October 11, 2006.</p>
